title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-3.18 - Lodging
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-3.18 - Lodging

State Regulations

Lodging
includes room, house or
apartment, and means living accommodations which meet generally accepted
standards for protection against fire, and all structural, sanitation and
similar standards in State and local laws, codes, regulations and ordinances
applicable to the premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
142-3.18

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
